member.name: M:WebExtreme.Security.Encryption.EncryptAndSavePassToConfigurationFile(System.String)
member.summary: Encodes a password to a configuration file (app.config). Required fields in a xml configuration file are: [add key="k1" value="(char)"] [add key="kn" value="(char)"] (to n = password length) [add key="length" value="(int)"] [add key="key" value="(int)#(int)# ..."]
member.param: the password which you would like to encode in the .config file

member.name: M:WebExtreme.Security.Encryption.DecodePasswordFromConfigurationFile
member.summary: Decodes a password from a configuration file (app.config). Required fields in a xml configuration file are: [add key="k1" value="(char)"] [add key="kn" value="(char)"] (to n = password length) [add key="length" value="(int)"] [add key="key" value="(int)#(int)# ..."]

member.name: T:WebExtreme.Security.Processes
member.summary: A Class for starting executable files in a secure manner using given credentials

member.name: M:WebExtreme.Security.Processes.ExecuteWithCredentials(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts an executable with the given credentials.
